rules_text:
Spectacle {1}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)[/i]
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
If Bloodied Overgrowth's spectacle cost was paid, you may put a land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
